file_content.text: You shouldn't stay here. I need to gather my strength to break out.
I know you. We talked before. My head's clearer now, Sith.
You went to retrieve my belongings? I don't know why. There's nothing there you can use to hurt the Jedi.
Then consider this proof that I'm here to help.
I'm showing you can trust me.
Here's your satchel.
I liked you better when your head was still fogged.
You're a real bother.
It's all here--the comlink, my lightsaber--everything I hid. You're going through with it.
With all this... once the guards change shifts, I think I can slip out of the Academy. But what about you--will you be okay?
Me? I'll be fine. I'm more worried about you.
I'd ask you the same.
That's... very kind of you, Sith.
I'll be fine.
If you're certain.
Korriban is my home, Jedi filth. I fear nothing here.
I am Sith!
I should have remembered that. I apologize for my concern.
I still don't understand why you're doing this, but I thank you.
You don't have to understand.
As you say, Sith. Thank you again.
It's a trap. Your memories were altered--when you report back to the Jedi, you'll tell them exactly what the Sith want you to.
This is all a setup.
What? Then--that explains why you would help me out, at least. But not why you would tell me the truth.
It isn't important now. But I will speak to my Masters of this. For the moment, I should go.
I'm... I'm sorry the Empire took you in, instead of the Jedi. If things had been different, maybe you could've been part of the order.
I am Sith, now and forever. There's nothing that can change that.
Things are how they are.
Possibly.
Learn from this; learn to hate and to fear.
You could consider joining us.
That's all you ever feel, isn't it? A pity.
Enough. You're free today--but one day, we will fight.
We'll next meet as enemies.
This is the end, then.
Goodbye, Sith. And may the Force be with you.
Stay away from Korriban next time. I won't be here to save you.
Watch out for trouble.
I'll make a note of it.
Goodbye, Jedi.
I'll see you out there.
May the Force be with you, as well.
And you.
I believe it will.
If you want to help me, Sith, bring me my belongings.
There is no emotion, there is peace. There is no ignorance, there is knowledge. The Jedi Code will guide me....
You. You don't look like one of the inquisitors. You don't look like you're here to kill me, either.
But you are Sith, aren't you? What do you want?
I take it you're the Jedi who was captured?
You're Quorian?
I am Quorian Dorjis. I am a Jedi--even here. Even on Korriban.
Are you hurt?
Ask the torturers; I'm sure they keep records of everything they've done. I stopped tracking when they started pulling teeth.
Why do you care? Why are you here?
I'm here to get you home--if you play your cards right.
I want to make a deal.
I'm a student here at the Academy. I'm here to rescue you.
I want to help.
Rescue me? A Sith is here to rescue me.
Why? Why would a Sith care about my life?
I'm not answering questions.
And I'm to trust you? The word of a Sith. I don't understand.
This torture is wrong.
You mean that. A Sith with a conscience.
You deserve a chance to fight for your freedom.
You're an honorable warrior.
And you're going to give me that chance? You want to help me get out of here and back to the Republic....
I want the Jedi to see you broken, and despair.
I wish you humiliated.
Is that my fate? To be a symbol of your triumph? Better than staying here, I suppose.
You're here to help me.
Why am I talking in circles? What's wrong with me?
Don't panic.
The inquisitors are messing with your mind. They pumped you full of drugs.
The Sith did it.
I suspected as much. It's so hard to think straight.
That's your problem.
You're right. I apologize.
There is no passion, there is serenity. There is no chaos, there is harmony. The Jedi Code will guide me.
I can focus. If you want to help me escape, I'll need my belongings: my lightsaber, my comlink.
All right.
I'm not sure we have time. We need to hurry, Jedi.
Too risky.
It'll go badly.
Well, this is how it must be. I won't make it beyond the Academy walls without my equipment.
My comlink will summon my ship--I don't think the Sith ever captured it--and I'll need my weapon if we fight.
Before I was captured, the Sith chased me into the tomb of Tulak Hord. I hid my belongings inside an urn to lighten my load; that is where you'll need to go.
I'll help out.
Thank you for this, Sith--whatever your reasons.
You're on thin ice.
I have little choice, now.
Try not to bleed to death while I'm gone.
Enjoy the prison.
I will do what I can.
There is no death, there is the Force. The Jedi Code will guide me....
I have no breath for you.
Sith? It's me. Don't talk, I can't risk them hearing me.
I'm ready to make a break for it, but I didn't want to leave without saying thank you.
If you're ever in the neutral worlds, head for Nar Shaddaa. There's a drop-box I keep there. I'll repay the favor. May the Force be with you, friend.
